Queen Serenia:
Berea first thought it was a simple ore from the spirit world Wind. She could get here with Benon, when he passed through the Spatial Gap.
Berea was lonely in rune. So someone left her a stone with a note: "a Gift from the homeland." From it came an unusual energy, and Beria decided to ask my advice. She sent me the stone. I knew immediately that it was Fake Astatin.
